name: York Local Plan

housing-numbers.notes: Plan period is 2017-2032/33 (16 years). Total target of 13,152 homes comprises strategic housing allocations (8,160), housing allocations (1,733), commitments (2,149), windfall allowance (1,592), plus 3,767 net completions 2017-2022. Annual requirement is 822 dwellings per year.

notes: Plan period is 2017-2032/33 (16 years). Total target of 13,152 homes comprises strategic housing allocations (8,160), housing allocations (1,733), commitments (2,149), windfall allowance (1,592), plus 3,767 net completions 2017-2022. Annual requirement is 822 dwellings per year.
